decks.notes: This Orzhov Aggro deck focuses on aggressive creature plays combined with removal spells to control the board. The deck includes powerful legendary creatures like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse, and Aclazotz, Deepest Betrayal, supported by cards like Cut Down and Go for the Throat to handle threats. The deck also has access to cards that provide tactical advantages, such as Virtue of Loyalty and Season of the Burrow. By efficiently managing threats and maintaining pressure on the opponent, this deck aims to quickly overwhelm and defeat the opponent.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and efficient removal spells. By playing powerful creature cards like Mosswood Dreadknight and Preacher of the Schism, combined with removal spells like Go for the Throat and Cut Down, the deck aims to control the board while dealing damage quickly to the opponent. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Gix's Command provide additional support and flexibility in the deck's strategy. With a mix of strong creatures and removal, this Golgari Aggro deck aims to dominate the battlefield and secure a victory.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on a fast and aggressive playstyle, utilizing powerful creatures like Trumpeting Carnosaur and Gloomfang Mauler to quickly overwhelm the opponent. Virtue of Persistence helps maintain board presence, while Gix's Command and Binding Negotiation provide disruption and control options. The deck also includes powerful late-game options like Sheoldred%2C+the+Apocalypse','','');">Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Geth, Thane of Contracts for additional pressure. The mana base is streamlined to ensure consistency in casting spells, and cards like Harvester of Misery and The Infamous Cruelclaw help to maintain the aggressive momentum throughout the game.

This deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy, focusing on utilizing cheap and efficient spells to continuously deal damage and clear the way for creatures to attack. The deck includes a mix of burn spells and pump spells to both control the board and increase the damage output of its creatures. With a low mana curve and a strong creature base, this deck thrives on speed and efficiency to quickly close out games before the opponent has a chance to stabilize.

This Golgari Aggro deck focuses on a fast and aggressive playstyle, utilizing a mix of powerful creatures and removal spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent. With cards like Mosswood Dreadknight and Glissa Sunslayer, the deck aims to apply constant pressure and push for a swift victory. The inclusion of cards like Cut Down and Go for the Throat help to remove any threats the opponent may have, while cards like Liliana of the Veil provide additional disruption. By efficiently utilizing its creatures and removal spells, this deck aims to outpace the opponent and secure a win.

This Orzhov Aggro deck focuses on aggressive creature plays combined with removal spells to control the board and apply pressure to the opponent. The deck exploits the synergy between cards like Fabled Passage, Caustic Bronco, and Preacher of the Schism to put pressure on the opponent while utilizing cards like Cut Down and Go for the Throat to deal with opposing threats. Additionally, cards like Liliana of the Veil and Virtue of Loyalty provide additional support and disruption to keep the opponent on their back foot. With a mix of aggressive creatures and removal, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent quickly and efficiently.

The focus of this Rakdos Aggro deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with low-cost creatures and a combination of direct damage spells. By playing aggressively and efficiently utilizing the deck's powerful creature abilities and burn spells, the goal is to deal damage as quickly as possible and maintain pressure on the opponent to close out the game before they have a chance to stabilize. With a mix of creatures with haste, pump effects, and direct damage spells, this deck aims to seize control of the board early and snowball to victory.

This UW Control deck focuses on stalling the opponent's resources and disrupting their strategy while building up card advantage through spells like Lay Down Arms and Deduce. The deck aims to control the game tempo with cards like Sunfall and Three Steps Ahead, eventually setting up for a game-winning play with Final Showdown or Teferi, Temporal Pilgrim. The inclusion of cards like Get Lost and Temporary Lockdown also serve to disrupt your opponent's game plan. The mana base includes Fabled Passage and various dual lands to ensure consistency in casting spells.

This deck focuses on controlling the board through a combination of powerful creature abilities and removal spells. It looks to stall out the game until it can overwhelm the opponent with its strong creatures like Archangel of Wrath and Atraxa, Grand Unifier. The deck utilizes cards like Sunfall and Leyline Binding to keep the opponent's threats in check while also generating value through cards like Herd Migration and Up the Beanstalk. With the right sequencing and resource management, this deck aims to grind out victories through incremental advantage and strategic decision-making.

The main concept of this UW Control deck is to utilize a variety of control spells and creatures to disrupt the opponent's game plan, stall the game, and eventually gain the upper hand through card advantage and strategic plays. With cards like Teferi, Temporal Pilgrim, Get Lost, and Deduce, the deck aims to control the pace of the game, while utilizing cards like Sunfall and Restless Anchorage to generate additional resources and maintain board presence. By efficiently managing resources and denying the opponent's key plays, this deck seeks to outlast and outmaneuver the opposition.

The main focus of this Rakdos Aggro deck is to put early pressure on the opponent with aggressive creatures like Deep-Cavern Bat and Gev, Scaled Scorch, supported by removal spells like Cut Down and Go for the Throat. The deck aims to quickly build a board presence and overwhelm the opponent with a combination of fast threats and efficient removal, utilizing cards like Flamecache Gecko and Fireglass Mentor for additional damage. With a strong mana base and a solid mix of creatures and spells, this deck aims to close out games quickly through aggressive attacking and efficient removal.
